info.name: Build your youtube theme
info.description:
Go to Mouse Hover off timer in customise settings to turn off hover effects if performance is an issue!
Feel free to criticize, highlight bugs , make suggestions, requests etc.
Tested in Chrome, functional in Firefox (more fixes to come please let me know if anything is broken!) ...
Thanks to my boys [A]live and Bodhi for bug testing
info.additionalInfo:
24/03/20-
fixed text in thumbnail video options


25/02/20-
theme has been updated, more fixes to come soon along with additionally features.


13/02/20-
theme is being updated expect fixes soon!

settings.label: background image colour(add a colour filter to your background image)
Border Colour(border colour of various parts
Primary font colour(text colour of main text, eg video title))
Secondary font color(non important text eg video details)
Color of some text when hovered
Box hover colour(the background colour of objects when mouse is hovered over an object)
Boxshadow colour(hover effect when mouse is positioned over some objects)
Colour of overlaying object (set transparency for pop up menus)
Mouse Hover off time (How long it takes for the hover effect to disappear)
